TopicTitle: KAS 0.5.1 on KSP 1.0.2 What are your experiences?

Articles.Content:
Being new to KSP, still playing vanilla. I am wondering if I should crank it up with KAS.

What are your experiences with it? Worth downloading? Bug problems?

I have this link: http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/223900-kerbal-attachment-system-kas (apparantly "KIS" must be installed first).

Thanks in advance.

Chris

This isn't really a support question and would likely be better directed to the mod's thread, located here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-1-0-2-Kerbal-Attachment-System-(KAS)-0-5-1

I have used KAS since I started using mods all the way back to the release of .23. It is great for refueling ships that don't have docking ports or strutting together two docked ships. It also makes EVA actually useful.
